info.name: Misc Items from Point Setting Guide

description.p: This golden stein is decorated with dancing dwarves and grain patterns. Speaking the command word ("Illefarn") while grasping the handle fills the tankard with three pints of rich dwarven ale. This power can be used up to three times per day.

A brass and leather belt engraved in runes with five loops to hold alcholic liquid containers. When a bottle is placed within a loop the runes along the loop alight. By spending a charge as a Free Action, you can replicate any Very Rare or lower Potion. You can also throw this item at a target to deliver the potion effect as long as the words "Order Up" are said to the target.
The weapon contains 4 charges which recharge at dawn.
Whilst wearing this inside any library, the wearer gains advantage or a +5 (whichever is higher) on intelligence checks to find books or information.
